title: About me
text:
Basic information
Hello everyone, my name is Weifan Wu. I am currently a third-year Ph.D.Â student in food science and technology. My focus is about antimicrobial activity of pomegranate against common foodborne pathogens.


Statistical experience
I was first exposed to statistics due to the requirement of program of study, however, I have gradually developed deep interest in statistical analysis, especially when itâ€™s applied to data in public health area. The statistics courses I have taken include experimental design, applied data analysis using SPSS, spatial epidemiology. Therefore, I have knowledge of statistics and some experience with data analysis using softwares such as R, SPSS, SAS. Since my interests mainly lie with public health data , I would like to gain in-depth experience with handling real-world public health data using R, which is something that I am looking forward to getting from this course.ðŸ¥³


Fun fact about me
my eyebrows can dance!ðŸ¤£


Unknown facts about data science
The attached linked is about 7 surprising facts about data science. The most striking fact is that less than 0.5% of all data we create is ever analysed and used.
